DataElement.preferredDefinition: Terminology to describe the type of disruption to the intervention or procedure by COVID-19.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disposition Domain Intervention or Procedure SARS Coronavirus 2 Disruption
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to disposition._An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects._A positive-sense single-stranded RNA virus in the genus Betacoronavirus. It is the causative agent of the 2019-2020 severe acute respiratory syndrome outbreak._An interruption or interference in continuity.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to disposition.

Concepts.definition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to disposition.

Property.preferredName: Intervention or Procedure SARS Coronavirus 2 Disruption
Property.preferredDefinition: An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.:A positive-sense single-stranded RNA virus in the genus Betacoronavirus. It is the causative agent of the 2019-2020 severe acute respiratory syndrome outbreak.:An interruption or interference in continuity.

Concepts.definition: An activity that produces an effect, or that is intended to alter the course of a disease in a patient or population. This is a general term that encompasses the medical, social, behavioral, and environmental acts that can have preventive, therapeutic, or palliative effects.
A positive-sense single-stranded RNA virus in the genus Betacoronavirus. It is the causative agent of the 2019-2020 severe acute respiratory syndrome outbreak.
An interruption or interference in continuity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Treatment using substances that travel through the bloodstream, reaching and affecting cells all over the body._An interruption or interference in continuity._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Specifies whether a planned or preestablished event or activity did not occur.: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.: To move an event to a different time or date.

Concepts.definition: Specifies whether a planned or preestablished event or activity did not occur.
An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
To move an event to a different time or date.

PermissibleValues.value: MODIFIED (E.G, NEW DOSE OR NEW SCHEDULE)
PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Change New Dose Or New Schedule

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Change New Dose Or New Schedule
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.: Having no previous example or precedent or parallel; of a kind not seen before.: A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.: Having no previous example or precedent or parallel; of a kind not seen before.: An ordered list of times at which things are planned to occur.

Concepts.definition: The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.
Having no previous example or precedent or parallel; of a kind not seen before.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Having no previous example or precedent or parallel; of a kind not seen before.
An ordered list of times at which things are planned to occur.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The quality of being unlike or dissimilar.: An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.: The act of putting one thing or person in the place of another.

Concepts.definition: The quality of being unlike or dissimilar.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
The act of putting one thing or person in the place of another.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: To stop or end, permanently or temporarily.

Concepts.definition: To stop or end, permanently or temporarily.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The use of telecommunications technology to provide, enhance, or expedite health care services, as by accessing off-site databases, linking clinics or physicians' offices to central hospitals, or transmitting x-rays or other diagnostic images for examination at another site. (Bartleby.com): The act of removing one thing and putting another thing in its place.

Concepts.definition: The use of telecommunications technology to provide, enhance, or expedite health care services, as by accessing off-site databases, linking clinics or physicians' offices to central hospitals, or transmitting x-rays or other diagnostic images for examination at another site. (Bartleby.com)
The act of removing one thing and putting another thing in its place.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A directive to indicate a response not listed.

Concepts.definition: A directive to indicate a response not listed.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Time during which some action is awaited; inactivity resulting in something being put off until a later time; the state of being slower or later.: Be specific about something; define clearly.: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification. : The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

Concepts.definition: Time during which some action is awaited; inactivity resulting in something being put off until a later time; the state of being slower or later.
Be specific about something; define clearly.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.
